summary: This mod adds a small shack just opposite Chillfurrow Farm that has everything needed inside, if you're sick of starting as a new character with little belongings or even if you're a high level player who can't be bothered to explore for 3 more dragon bones...well now you can just take 500. See description and images. Requires All 3 DLC
descriptionHtml:
And for my first mod...I give you a shack that contains over 150,000 pounds of items inside, I hope you have a large enough carry weight. This shack, The Almighty Shack O' Chests has crafting stations (Workbench, Tanning Rack, Grindstone, Smelter, Cooking Spit, Alchemy Table, Enchanting Table a bed and a secret trap door. To gain entry to the shack one must find the legendary key...which happens to be right outside in a chest! Inside the 18 chests are: Smithing Supplies, Alchemy Ingredients, Potions & Poisons, Recipes, Food & Drink, Firewood & Salt, Jewellery, Soul Gems, Arrows, Bows, Every Sort of Weapon, Most Armor Sets, Staves, All Spell Tomes, Shields, Daedric Artifacts, Atronach Forge Items, Weapons & Armor that contain all the enchantments for disenchanting. The best bit? Outside the shack is a lovely table set for a romantic dinner, next to that is a fishing area and next to that is a bridge to get on the road. The very best bit? There's thousands of supplies inside that shack. Please endorse the mod if you like it. Requires Dawnguard, Hearthfire & Dragonborn. I will be working on the last Dragonborn chests very soon.

Installation:

Download with Nexus Mod Manager or open the file manually and extract the file to your Skyrim Data directory.
author: benjy2000
